descriptionHtml:
***This mod would conflict with any other mod that replaces the argonian skin textures, including the raptor feet mod***

-Adds several new skin tints
-Brightens existing skin tints
-Adds modified Argonian skin texture
-Adds new warpaint/face colors
-Adds a preset of the argonian in the preview picture

This mod creates brighter colored Argonians, as well as adding a few more shades of skin color: purple, blue, teal, black, and gold.

It brightens most of the existing shades, like white, red, and green.

It also imports a modified argonian skin texture, which is tweaked to be brighter and less green.

Also added are new warpaint and face colors: light blue, dark blue, dark purple, black, gold, lime, teal, and dark pink.

The above screenshots are NOT before and after, they are just screenshot of all the skintones.

The mod is also applied to Argonian NPCs
The unnatural skintones will not be applied to any NPCs, they may be brightened but will retain their skintone.

Known Issues:
Sometimes the skintones fail to show up
Sometimes the hands do not match the skintones

The only way I've been able to fix it is by uninstalling, running the game, then closing the game, and reinstalling. It may help to start a new game or open showRaceMenu. If someone knows a better fix let me know.
author: ZombieData
